author: Warhammer
description:
Centurions are key commanders of the Legiones Astartes, each one a powerful warrior and inspirational leader. Emma is here to show you how to paint this miniature in the colours of the Salamanders, so you can add it to your growing army.

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Base:
Corax White
Corvus Black
Iron Hands Steel
Mephiston Red
Rakarth Flesh
Waaagh! Flesh

Layer:
Elysian Green
Fire Dragon Bright
Kreig Khaki
Skullcrusher Brass
Stormhost Silver
Wild Rider Red
Yriel Yellow

Shade:
Agrax Earthshade

Tools:
L Base Brush
S Dry Brush
S Base Brush
S Layer Brush
M Layer Brush

If you're new to painting, our Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@warhammerofficial
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/
- Warhammer Community: https://www.warhammer-community
title: Salamanders Centurion in MkII Power Armour | Warhammer: The Horus Heresy
